timeline.message:
:art: Minor graphics improvements
* Standardised the the preferences warning on the graphs and font labels tabs and dialled down the red text
* Fixed some spelling errors in what's new
* Renamed the images folder to resources so it is consistent to other recent changes
* Minor wording change to the GC collection label
:memo: Added a what's new for the font improvement

timeline.bodyText:
General refactoring:
BlazeSizeDescription1 - upon further inspection was added by me, it can be renamed to BlazeOpacityDescription
blazeSlider - Can be renamed to BlazeSizeSlider to match BlazeOpacitySlider
Also, I seem to have used camel case and title case - Whichever is preferred I am happy to have them changed to be consistent with the rest of the declarations.
timeline.author: aldebaran30701

replies.bodyText: @aldebaran30701 I've updated the variables and its now ready for a review.
replies.author: arcturus2

timeline.message: :art: Minor wording improvement based on feedback
